docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.text: Daily Expressions Daily activities for repeat aloud I'm going to brush my teeth I'm going to have a cup of coffee
docs.title: Daily Expressions

docs.text: Daily activities for repeat aloud I'm going to brush my teeth I'm going to have a cup of coffee
docs.title: Daily Expressions

docs.text: How are you? It's particulary common to use: "I'm fine thank you, and you" , but isn't not natural. It's better using something like: Good! Great! I'm good how are you?
docs.title: How are you?

docs.text: It's particulary common to use: "I'm fine thank you, and you" , but isn't not natural. It's better using something like: Good! Great! I'm good how are you?
docs.title: How are you?

docs.text: Not use "I don't know" Instead of use I don't know better use the next senteces: When I don't have a lot of information to share or don't really want to share the information, I can to use something like that: I have no idea No idea I have no clue not a clue no clue beats me how should i know? Don't ask me When I can get some information, I can to use something like this: I'm not sure I'm not sure, but I can find out Your guess is as good as mine Who knows? I wish a knew Si no sabe la respuesta pero va a tratar de encontrarla (más común en el trabajo) If I really don't have the answer but I can try to find out, I can to use something like that: I'll get back to you on that Si con la información que tengo no puedo respoder la pregunta, entonces se puede utilizar: If with the information that I have, I can't answer, I can to use the next sentece: Not as far as I know And finally I could combine phrases, like that: I'm not sure, but I'll try to find out I'm not sure, but I'll double-check I'm not sure, but let me look into it I'm not sure, but I'll check I'm not sure, let me find out, and I'll get back to you I'm not sure, let me find out, and I'll let you know Como truco, si no se del todo la respuesta podría utilizar: That's a good question
docs.title: Not use "I don't know"

docs.text: Instead of use I don't know better use the next senteces: When I don't have a lot of information to share or don't really want to share the information, I can to use something like that: I have no idea No idea I have no clue not a clue no clue beats me how should i know? Don't ask me When I can get some information, I can to use something like this: I'm not sure I'm not sure, but I can find out Your guess is as good as mine Who knows? I wish a knew Si no sabe la respuesta pero va a tratar de encontrarla (más común en el trabajo) If I really don't have the answer but I can try to find out, I can to use something like that: I'll get back to you on that Si con la información que tengo no puedo respoder la pregunta, entonces se puede utilizar: If with the information that I have, I can't answer, I can to use the next sentece: Not as far as I know And finally I could combine phrases, like that: I'm not sure, but I'll try to find out I'm not sure, but I'll double-check I'm not sure, but let me look into it I'm not sure, but I'll check I'm not sure, let me find out, and I'll get back to you I'm not sure, let me find out, and I'll let you know Como truco, si no se del todo la respuesta podría utilizar: That's a good question
docs.title: Not use "I don't know"
